Title: Naked
Plot: As Jeff's 30th birthday approaches, his new boss Julia Davis questions the girls about whether one should kiss a junior work colleague, while Jeff admits to the lads that he had a close encounter of the Nat (Nose Avoidance Tilt) kind in a stationery cupboard at work.
GuestStars: Anwen Williams, Ian Ralph, Mike Sherman, Suzann McLean, Ewan Watson, Ben Homewood, Simon Clayton
